title: Understanding A.D.D.: Attention Deficit Disorder
creator_credit: Australian Video Publishers and Bryan Lowe
brief_description: Dr. Christopher Green, author of the famous “Toddler taming” and “Babies”, is a leading authority on Attention Deficit Disorder. This program, designed for parents, teachers and healthcare professionals, investigates key issues about the disorder. It profiles the causes of ADD, behaviours associated with the condition, diagnosis, treatment, medication, adult manifestations of the condition and includes a segment with questions from the audience.
